start_sources()
# -- resourcecompilerxml.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "DrxCommonTools"
		"../../DrxCommonTools/PathHelpers.cpp"
		"../../DrxCommonTools/StringHelpers.cpp"
		"../../DrxCommonTools/PathHelpers.h"
		"../../DrxCommonTools/StringHelpers.h"
	SOURCE_GROUP "DrxSystem"
		"../../../DinrusX/DrxSystem/XML/XMLBinaryNode.cpp"
		"../../../DinrusX/DrxSystem/XML/XMLBinaryReader.cpp"
		"../../../DinrusX/DrxSystem/XML/XMLBinaryWriter.cpp"
		"../../../DinrusX/DrxSystem/XML/XMLBinaryNode.h"
		"../../../DinrusX/DrxSystem/XML/XMLBinaryReader.h"
		"../../../DinrusX/DrxSystem/XML/XMLBinaryWriter.h"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Source Files"
		"../ResourceCompiler/IConfig.cpp"
		"ResourceCompilerXML.cpp"
		"XMLConverter.cpp"
		"ResourceCompilerPlugin.def"
		"stdafx.h"
		"stdafx.cpp"
		"XMLConverter.h"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

DrxResourceCompilerModule(ResourceCompilerXML PCH "StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "RC")
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE 
	"${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ResourceCompiler" 
	"${DRXENGINE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/Tools" 
	"${DRXENGINE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/Tools/DrxXML"
	"${DRXENGINE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/Tools/DrxCommonTools"
	"${DRXENGINE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/DinrusX/DrxSystem/XML")
target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE /EHsc)
set_target_properties(${THIS_PROJECT} PROPERTIES LINK_FLAGS "/DEF:ResourceCompilerPlugin.def")

ADD_CUSTOM_COMMAND(TARGET ${THIS_PROJECT} POST_BUILD
	COMMAND "${CMAKE_COMMAND}" -E copy "\"${DRXENGINE_SOURCE_DIR}/Code/Tools/RC/ResourceCompilerXML/xmlfilter.txt\"" 
	"\"${DRXENGINE_SOURCE_DIR}/Tools/rc\""
	COMMENT "Copy xmlfilter.txt into output folder.")
